---@class bt_con_isAutoBattle:ICondition
local bt_con_isAutoBattle = SimpleClassUtil:class(ICondition)

function bt_con_isAutoBattle:initData(data)
  self._compareValue = data
end

---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
---@param agent Agent
function bt_con_isAutoBattle:doCondition(blackBoard,agent)
    local result = Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    result = (agent._battleManager._automaticBattle == self._compareValue)
            and Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success or Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    self:log("bt_con_isAutoBattle : ",result)
    return result
end


return bt_con_isAutoBattle
